display_long_description:
Experience the thrill of R/C airplane flying! 
This simulator puts you in control of a highly realistic airplane in a beautifully rendered environment, recreating the precision and excitement of line-of-sight flying. Perfect for beginners and seasoned pilots alike, this VR experience offers a unique way to enjoy R/C flight, rain or shine.

Practice alone, or learn from others in online multiplayer.

Seasoned pilots can use it to keep their skills sharp when the weather isn’t ideal, while newcomers will find it an accessible way to practice fundamental maneuvers. With its true-to-life controls and immersive visuals, simulated wind and thermals, this app lets you soar as if you were really at the field. The included challenges like R/C limbo and dropping water balloons are designed to be fun while practicing essential flying skills.

Optionally use a gamepad or connect your actual R/C transmitter over USB (when compatible) for ultimate realism. 

We’d love your feedback to make this experience even better! There's a link to our Discord server on our website if you want to get involved.
So grab your headset, take to the skies, and let us know what you think or what you would like to see added next!
